Package javacc.structure

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Association
    Associations do not have ID, 1+ association must be contained in every TopicMap
    AssociationRole
    AssociationRoles are usually Association.associationRole_MAX_SIZE elements.
    Topic
    1+ Topic must be contained in every TopicMap structure
    TopicMap
    One object TopicMap is contained in every XTM
    TopicName
    1 TopicName must be contained in every Topic
    TopicNameVariant
    1+ TopicNameVariant can be contained in every TopicName.tnvList
    TopicOccurrence
    0+ TopicOccurence can be contained in every Topic
    XTM
    XTM is a specialization of the XML language, one of its derivates specifically designed to format information with an associative structure: XTM is the XML format variant specific for concept maps, semantic networks, knowledge bases, and in general, for logical and cognitive structures.
